xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/896183-Chip On My Shoulder: The Cautionary Tale of Slapshot 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nsVca8ZpKEw9nLaCSMOZHvU3I3T.jpg An unflinching look into the life of a band that was seemingly destined to implode from its very inception. This is a story of friendship and betrayal, loss and redemption, self-destruction and sacrifice. Born in the streets and underground music halls of Boston, Slapshot went on to inspire millions worldwide while simultaneously tearing a group of friends apart. Chip On My Shoulder: The Cautionary Tale of Slapshot
